text: Krishna Menon Memorial Government Women's College is an educational institution in Kannur, India. ==Courses offered== * B.A History * B.A Economics with Indian History * B.A Economics with Mathematical Economics * B.A English with Journalism * B.A Malayalam with Sanskrit * B.Sc. Physics * B.Sc. Mathematics * B.Sc. Zoology * B.Sc. Chemistry ==Affiliation== Krishna Menon Memorial Government Women's College, Kannur is affiliated to the Kannur University.http://14.139.185.42/newsite/colleges/knr%20arts.htm ==See also== * * Kannur University * Sir Syed College * Payyannur College == References == Category:Colleges affiliated to Kannur University Category:Women's universities and colleges in Kerala Category:Universities and colleges in Kannur district
title: Krishna Menon Women's College
